00026 #ifndef YA_LLE_REDUCE_H
00027 #define YA_LLE_REDUCE_H
00028 
00029 YALANAMESPACE
00030 
00032 
00037 template<class eltype>
00038 class YALLEReduce : public YADimReduce<eltype> {
00039  public:
00040   YALLEReduce() {}
00041   ~YALLEReduce() {};
00042 
00044   const string method_name() const {
00045   return "Locally Linear Embedding"; }
00046   
00048   const string method_id() const {
00049   return "LLE"; }
00050 
00052   const string version() const {
00053   return "0.1"; }
00054 
00056 
00059   template <class mat_type, class ya_type2>
00060   int find_map(const YA_BaseT &input, ya_type2 &output, ya_sizet dim,
00061                EigenOptions &eigopts);
00062 
00064   template <class ya_type1, class ya_type2>
00065   void forward_map(const ya_type1 &input, ya_type2 &output) const;
00066   
00068   template <class ya_type1, class ya_type2>
00069   void reverse_map(const ya_type1 &input, ya_type2 &output) const;
00070 
00072 
00075   int find(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &output, ya_sizet dim,
00076            EigenOptions &eigopts) {
00077     return find_map(input,output,dim,eigopts);
00078   }
00080   void forward(const YA_MatT &input, 
00081              YA_MatT &output) const {
00082   forward_map(input,output); }
00084   void reverse(const YA_MatT &input, 
00085              YA_MatT &output) const {
00086   reverse_map(input,output); }
00087   
00088   using YADimReduce<eltype>::load_map;
00089   using YADimReduce<eltype>::save_map;
00091   void save_map(ostream &out) const;
00093   int load_map(istream &in);
00094 
00095  private:
00096   YA_MatT eigen_vectors;
00097 };
00098 
00099 }
